item0.jcr:title: We.Retail All Activities
item0.value: SELECT * from [dam:Asset] AS a WHERE isdescendantnode(a, '/content/dam/we-retail/en/activities') AND [/jcr:content/metadata/dc:title] IS NOT NULL AND [/jcr:content/metadata/dc:description] IS NOT NULL AND [/jcr:content/metadata/xmp:CreatorTool] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NAME(a) ASC

item1.jcr:title: Get Outside Query 1 - sort by file name ascending
item1.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo/get-outside-assets") ORDER BY NAME(s) ASC

item2.jcr:title: Get Outside Query 2 - sort by file name descending
item2.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo/get-outside-assets") ORDER BY NAME(s) DESC
